tasks.title: Scan and Analyze Connection Components
tasks.description: Identify all connection integration components and map their connectionType options.
tasks.details: Traverse the codebase to list all connection form components. For each, document available connectionType options (if any), and note structural variations. Output a comprehensive mapping (e.g., JSON or spreadsheet) of integrations and their connectionType options.
tasks.testStrategy: Review the generated mapping for completeness and accuracy by cross-referencing with the codebase and integration documentation.

tasks.title: Document Component Patterns and Variations
tasks.description: Identify and document common patterns and differences among connection form components.
tasks.details: Analyze the mapping from Task 1 to extract reusable patterns and highlight unique cases. Document findings to inform generic test architecture and potential refactoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Peer review documentation for clarity and completeness. Validate against at least three representative integrations.

tasks.title: Audit and Standardize Accessibility Attributes
tasks.description: Ensure all form action buttons have aria-label or title attributes sourced from i18n translations.
tasks.details: Audit all connection form components for the presence of aria-label or title attributes on action buttons. Where missing or inconsistent, add or standardize these attributes using @src/locales/en/ translations. Ensure consistent data-testid usage as well.
tasks.testStrategy: Automated and manual checks for attribute presence and correctness. Use accessibility testing tools and verify i18n integration.

tasks.title: Refactor Components for Testability
tasks.description: Refactor connection form components as needed to support generic, maintainable testing.
tasks.details: Based on findings from Tasks 2 and 3, refactor components to expose consistent selectors, props, and test hooks. Ensure all action buttons are easily identifiable and testable.
tasks.testStrategy: Code review and test run validation to ensure refactored components are testable and maintain existing functionality.

tasks.title: Design Generic, Data-Driven Test Architecture
tasks.description: Create a reusable, data-driven test framework for connection forms.
tasks.details: Implement a test architecture that loads integration and connectionType data from external sources (e.g., JSON fixtures). Avoid hardcoding integration-specific logic. Use modular test utilities and fixtures for scalability.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit and integration tests for test utilities. Peer review of architecture for maintainability and scalability.

tasks.title: Implement Button Presence Tests for Multi-Type Connections
tasks.description: Automate tests to verify action button presence for integrations with multiple connectionType options.
tasks.details: For each integration with a connectionType Select component (e.g., GitHub), iterate through all options and assert the presence of 'Save Connection' or 'Start OAuth Flow' button after selection.
tasks.testStrategy: Run tests across all multi-type integrations. Validate that tests pass and fail as expected when buttons are missing.

tasks.title: Implement Button Presence Tests for Single-Type Connections
tasks.description: Automate tests to verify action button presence for integrations without multiple connectionType options.
tasks.details: For each single-type integration (e.g., AWS, OpenAI), select the integration and assert the immediate presence of the required action button.
tasks.testStrategy: Run tests across all single-type integrations. Validate that tests pass and fail as expected when buttons are missing.

tasks.title: Implement Accessibility Attribute Tests
tasks.description: Automate tests to verify that all form action buttons have correct aria-label or title attributes.
tasks.details: For each connection form, assert that action buttons have aria-label or title attributes matching i18n translations. Use selectors and test utilities to validate attribute values.
tasks.testStrategy: Run accessibility attribute tests across all integrations. Use automated accessibility tools and manual spot checks.

tasks.title: Integrate Tests with CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Ensure all tests run automatically in the CI/CD pipeline with single worker settings.
tasks.details: Configure the test runner to execute with --workers=1 --project=Chrome. Integrate with the CI/CD system to trigger tests on code changes. Ensure test reports are generated and failures are actionable.
tasks.testStrategy: Trigger pipeline runs on pull requests and merges. Validate that tests execute reliably and results are reported.

tasks.title: Document Test Patterns and Maintenance Guidelines
tasks.description: Create documentation for test architecture, patterns, and maintenance procedures.
tasks.details: Write clear documentation on how to add new integrations, update test data, and maintain the test suite. Include examples and troubleshooting tips.
tasks.testStrategy: Peer review documentation for clarity and completeness. Validate by onboarding a new team member to follow the guide.
